bestPractices: FormControl prevents native submit by default. Handle submission in `onSubmitValues(values, event)` and keep the flow inside your SPA.
Always provide `name` on fields within a FormControl so values bind to the store and appear in the typed payload.
For files or nonâ€‘valet inputs, merge `new FormData(event.currentTarget)` with your typed `values` in `onSubmitValues`.
Choose validation mode explicitly: rely on native constraints (default) or pass `noValidate` and surface errors with `error` + `helperText` on fields.
If you depend on browser autofill, verify final values at submit time by reading `FormData` to avoid stale store state when no change events fired.
